body:
Hi Galen,

Try grabbing the latest HEAD from www.radiance-online.org and compile
the modified version of gendaylit included there. It doesn't seem to
have this problem.  I get:

% gendaylit 4 13 7 -a 40.3 -o 79.9 -m 75 -W 401 41
# gendaylit 4 13 7 -a 40.3 -o 79.9 -m 75 -W 401 41
# Ground ambient level: 4.8

void light solar
0
0
3 2.605e+06 2.605e+06 2.605e+06

solar source sun
0
0
4 0.973844 0.003467 0.227192 0.533000

void brightfunc skyfunc
2 skybright perezlum.cal
0
10 1.781e+01 3.513e+00 -1.131043 -0.338979 13.047373 -3.410216
0.426223 0.973844 0.003467 0.227192

Best,
-Greg
subject: [Radiance-general] gendaylit: segmentation fault
